papers.title: ART: Artifact Removal Transformer for Reconstructing Noise-Free Multichannel EEG
papers.rationale: Core paper. Directly addresses transformer-based EEG artifact removal.

papers.title: CT-DCENet: Deep EEG Denoising via CNN-Transformer-Based Dual-Stage Collaborative
papers.rationale: Core paper. CNN-Transformer hybrid for EEG denoising.

papers.title: Augmenting brain-computer interfaces with ART
papers.rationale: Core paper. ART application for BCI.

papers.title: EEG Artifact Removal using Stacked Multi-Head Attention Transformer Architecture
papers.rationale: Core paper. Multi-head attention transformer for EEG artifacts.

papers.title: A GAN Guided Parallel CNN and Transformer Network for EEG Denoising
papers.rationale: Core paper. GAN + CNN + Transformer hybrid for EEG denoising.

papers.title: EEGDnet: Fusing non-local and local self-similarity for EEG signal denoising with attention
papers.rationale: Core paper. Attention-based EEG denoising with self-similarity.

papers.title: EEGDfus: A Conditional Diffusion Model for Fine-Grained EEG Denoising
papers.rationale: Core paper. Diffusion model approach for EEG denoising.

papers.title: DHCT-GAN: Dual-Branch Hybrid CNN-Transformer for EEG Signal Quality
papers.rationale: Core paper. Dual-branch CNN-Transformer GAN architecture.

papers.title: Deep Learning in EEG-Based BCIs: Comprehensive Review of Transformer Models
papers.rationale: Review paper. Comprehensive transformer survey for EEG-BCIs.

papers.title: Exploring Convolutional Neural Network Architectures for EEG Feature Extraction
papers.rationale: Methodological context. CNN architectures for EEG.

papers.title: A Review of Issues Related to Data Acquisition and Analysis in EEG/MEG Studies
papers.rationale: Foundational review. EEG noise sources and preprocessing challenges.

papers.title: Motor Imagery EEG Signals Classification Based on Mode Amplitude and Frequency
papers.rationale: Application context. EEG preprocessing for BCI classification.

papers.title: Role of machine learning and deep learning in EEG-based BCI emotion recognition
papers.rationale: Application context. ML/DL for EEG with preprocessing discussion.

papers.rationale: Clinical application. EEG preprocessing for seizure detection.
